remarks: Value of the opposite Yoneda embedding.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jan-2017.)
statement:
oppcyon.o $e |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) $.
oppcyon.y $e |- Y = ( Yon ` O ) $.
oppcyon.m $e |- M = ( HomF ` C ) $.
oppcyon.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
oppcyon $p |- ( ph -> Y = ( <. O , C >. curryF M ) ) $.
